name: BBCWorld
text:
The four-day all-virtual Democratic National Convention kicks off now 

Democrats will formally choose Joe Biden as their candidate to battle Donald Trump for the White House
 
Follow for live updates ➡️ https://t.co/k9VxI2cN7g
